pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Texture Styling Sea Salt Spray 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Texture Styling Sea Salt Spray Strong Hold protects the hair from drying out.

Schwarzkopf Extra Care offers a range of innovative styling products that help you create your desired hairstyle. The professional formulas give your reliable long-lasting styling results, whilst protecting your hair from damage or drying out, so you can walk out the door looking like the best version of yourself - every day, every time.

- Natural beach curls & tousled textured look.

- 48H strong hold.

- Lightweight, without stickiness & easy to brush out.

Textured finish. Beach styles.

48H hold & care formula.

Size: 250mL

Ingredients

Aqua, Alcohol Denat., Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-32, Maris Salt, Parfum, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

Directions

Shake bottle well before use. Spray evenly on dry or towel-dried hair. Scrunch or tousle style as desired. Blow dry or let the hair dry naturally.
